Photo gallery
There were many strong words exchanged during the first three hours of Thursday's hearing of the House Selection Committee on Benghazi — as well as many strong looks. As former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton continues to face questioning on the 2012 attacks on the consulate in Libya that killed four Americans, POLITICO takes a look at some of Clinton's varied reactions.

            By 
Diana D’Abruzzo

10/22/15 02:34 PM EDT

description: There were many strong words exchanged during the first three hours of Thursday's hearing of the House Selection Committee on Benghazi — as well as many strong looks. As former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton continues to face questioning on the 2012 attacks on the consulate in Libya that killed four Americans, POLITICO takes a look at some of Clinton's varied reactions.
title: Hillary on the hot seat: 31 looks from the Benghazi hearing
